entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improving DataProtection linkability #41411
  • Unstated build dependency for e2e tests + tests won't run #41408
  • Invalid form key returns internal server error #41407
  • SignalR JavaScript client: Updating query parameters during active connection #41405
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #41404
  • Perf improvement: json #41403
  • Allow to specify type to serialize in SystemTextJsonOutputFormatter #41399
  • F# asp.net 5.x app broken after migration to 6.x #41398
  • Hash in service-worker-assets.js is stale after build #41396
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Server .NET 6 Drag n Drop mobile devices #41394
  • Element’s attribute change causes performance lack when hosted the application in US region and accessed in India or Brazil location #41393
  • Try to improve or remove `IOQueue` for sends in Kestrel #41391
  • Blazor navigation not work properly on Safari iOS latest #41390

Closed

  • Add/Modify Url Encoding/Decoding for IIS UrlRewrite #5985
    Backlog
  • 7.0.0-preview.4 Backport: Endpoint metadata is not discovered from return types implementing IEndpointMetadataProvider if the method is async #41387
    7.0-preview4
  • Assembly Microsoft.AspNetCore.Cryptography.KeyDerivation fails to load when running on Linux #41368
  • Perf regression: json #41392
  • .NET 6 application sometimes loading incorrect appsettings.{environment}.json #41381
  • Endpoint metadata is not discovered from return types implementing IEndpointMetadataProvider if the method is async #41384
    7.0-preview5
  • Unexpected Error if blazor page has same URl for two pages #41361
  • Remove allocation in ValueTask<object> response processing path #41376
    7.0-preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure IResult types throw ArgumentNullExceptions on public methods #41412
    area-runtime
  • Zero byte reads support for EnableBuffering/FileBufferingReadStream #41410
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Add support for RouteHandlerInvocationContext<> overloads #41406
    area-web-frameworks
  • Allow Multiple Wildcard Prefix Server Names of the Same Length in SNI Configuration #41402
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Try out 1es images #41400
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Add/Modify Url Encoding/Decoding for IIS UrlRewrite #40483
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview5
  • Remove allocations in ValueTask<object> and Task<object> codepaths #41379
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview5
  • Allow HttpSys zero-byte reads #41305 #41332
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • [release/7.0-preview4] Fix discovery of endpoint metadata from async route handlers #41388
    area-runtime, ask-mode
  • Fix discovery of endpoint metadata from async route handlers #41386
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Fix diff checks for ContentRoot and WebRoot #41182
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Update SDK #41158
    blocked, area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Enable trimming for middleware and friends #41373
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update duende versions to 6.0.4 #41370
    area-infrastructure
  • Draft Surrogate argument list #41325
    area-web-frameworks
  • JSON "null" response body rejected as an empty response body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Determine next log file number from directory on first run #41375
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix MapPath and UsePathBase's use of implicit PathStrings #41382
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Throw BadHttpRequestException for non-ASCII in absolute-form targets #41334
    area-runtime
